main event: A citizen reported observing a round, silvery unidentified flying object hovering in the sky near Columbia, South Carolina on May 6, 1968.
interesting points: The witness described the object as round and glowing,The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes, during which the object moved slowly from west to east,There were no lights visible on the object and it was observed in clear weather,Two citizens were confirmed witnesses to the event,The film submitted after the incident exhibited water spots likely from processing.
witness description: The witness was outside doing yard work when the object was observed.
